sub_title: Cluster Sales Manager at Hyatt Regency Amsterdam & Andaz Amsterdam Prinsengracht
summary: I am a proactive, resilient and efficient sales professional who strives to succeed and reach targets, achieve budgets and increase market share, with a positive “can do” attitude. One of my goals is continually delivering excellent customer service using my strong communication and negotiation skills and the ability to be creative. I have wide experience in event and contract management with confirmed bookings over 100K. I have remote-working experience in previous positions. Colleagues recognize me as a person who can be trusted, with fantastic time management, optimization and leadership skills and capable of working well both independently as well as a team member. I am available and happy to travel and relocate. Furthermore, I also have dual Spanish and British nationality.

education.field_of_study: Superior Technician in Telecommunication and Informatics

authors.headline: Cluster Sales Manager at Hyatt Regency Amsterdam & Andaz Amsterdam Prinsengracht

profile_positions.location: Hyatt Regency Amsterdam & Andaz Amsterdam Prinsengracht
profile_positions.description:
Key Responsabilities:
- Implementing sales action plans
- Pre-qualifying and targeting prospects, utilizing hotel database and developing effective sales strategies to increase hotel’s market share
- Establishing and maintaining strong relationship with clients, constantly exploring new business opportunities and sourcing for information in regards to upcoming events
- Entertaining and conducting hotel inspections
- Meeting and greeting VIP guests upon arrival/departure
- Planning and making sales trips to current and potential clientele
profile_positions.title: Cluster Sales Manager

profile_positions.description: - Collaborate with regular articles on tourism and travel with Bioguia, the largest sustainable community in Latin America & Spain.
profile_positions.title: Travel & Tourism Writer

profile_positions.description:
Key responsibilities:
- Identify new potential market opportunities
- Establish productive relationships and partnerships with key accounts
- Offer & implement creative solutions to hoteliers maximizing their online results
- Negotiate and close agreements with clients ensuring profitability
- Ensure deadlines are met and budgets are maintained
- Develop plans for company growth and achievement of sales targets
- Build the company’s brand
- Submit weekly, monthly, quarterly and annual performance reports to headquarters in Finland
profile_positions.title: Country Sales Manager

profile_positions.description:
Key responsibilities:
- Assist in the implementation of the Annual Sales Strategy Plan (goals, tactics & actions)
- Achieve and exceed forecasted revenue figures in rooms, F&B and other revenue departments
- Proactively contact agencies, banks and other companies to follow up on their production, their needs and launch special offers
- Conduct hotel site visits
- Monitor and evaluate local, national and international market trends, and the competitor hotel’s sales initiatives, in order to make sure that the hotel remains competitive and cutting edge
- Ensure that the best use is made of technology including Envision, Salesforce, Opera and other sales and catering systems

Key achievements:
- Deliver Annual Roadshow Sales Strategy Plan 2020
- Creation of the “Sustainable Roadshow Menu”, based on green, healthy and sustainable products

Others:
- Unfortunately my position was made redundant due to COVID-19
profile_positions.title: Sales Manager Roadshow

profile_positions.description:
Key responsibilities:
- Sell guestrooms, meeting spaces, F&B and in general event services to Corporate, pharmaceutical, SMERF, sport, entertainment, government, GT and other markets
- Manage large events and prepare contracts with converted bookings over 100K
- Reach goals, achieve budget and increase market share
- Analysis of trends of the market and competitors in order to exceed the client’s expectation

Key achievements:
- Success in managing the annual key account of Atletico de Madrid Football Club
- Active contribution to the 3 best consecutive years of the history of Hilton Madrid Airport (2017, 2018 & 2019)
- Increase in converted sales in 281% from 2017 to 2018 and in 128% from 2018 to 2019
- Contribution to the hotel with new ideas, like the "Green Action"
- Champion of the Meeting Simplified package
- Cross training with the Sales Manager
- Courses completed: Negotiation / Qualifying prospects / Customer focus / Leisure sales / Time management / GC&E EMEA Sales Development Programme Leadership
- Team Member of the Month, September 2019
profile_positions.title: GC&E Sales Executive

profile_positions.description:
Key responsibilities:
- Receive and convert incoming enquiries to achieve targets and maximize revenue
- Adopt a “Sales” attitude. Focus on a consistently executed up-selling approach
- Seek opportunities to increase sales and conversions within the team
- Manage an events schedule to maximise yield
- Build strong relationships with customers to fully understand their needs to meet or exceed those expectations at all times
- Arrange and carry out hotel show rounds
- Ensure the complete administration and execution of all planned events
- Participate in hotel promotional activities

Key achievements:
- Several trainings completed, like Enquiry handling, Delphi diagrams or Negotiation
- Manage more than 100 bookings, with huge loads of work every day.
- Successfully moved from a starter to a senior position in the role
profile_positions.title: GC&E Sales Executive

profile_positions.description:
Key responsibilities:
- Deliver high standards on check in/out procedures, problem solving and following up on requests in an efficient manner
- Ensure that both the Front Office Manager and supervisors are kept fully aware of any relevant feedback from guests and/or other departments
- Demonstrate a knowledge of hotel room categories, room rates, packages, promotions and other general product knowledge necessary to perform daily duties
- Maximize room occupancy and use up-selling techniques to promote hotel services and facilities
- Use the correct procedures regarding the acceptance of foreign currencies, credit cards and cash in accordance with the hotel credit policy
- Comply with hotel security, fire regulations and all health and safety legislation
- Executive Lounge Agent

Key achievements:
- Sales & Events cross training completed
- Social Media Champion
- Champion of the month for room upsells in Jul, Sept & Nov 2015 and Feb, March & April 2016 
- Champion of the month for breakfast vouchers sold in July & Oct 2015 and March and April 2016
- Champion of the month for dinners vouchers sold in July & Sept 2015
- Champion of the month for achieving most 9/10s in Salt in Jan 2016
- Initiative in implementation of express check out procedure
- Implementation of personalized check-in for children
profile_positions.title: Front Desk Agent

profile_positions.description:
Key responsibilities: 
- Welcome guests and providing information
- Complete receptionist check list
- Perform check-in and check-out procedures
- Answer calls and following up with requests and performing Executive Lounge agent duties

Key achievements:
- Satisfactory completion of Internship
- Offered a receptionist position after Internship. However, I declined owning my contract beginning with Hilton London Olympia
profile_positions.title: Front Desk Agent

profile_positions.description:
- Basic troubleshooting, maintenance and service repair needs on designated equipment
- Complete Preventative Maintenance and Field Modification Instruction
- Manage repair parts cycle times
- Keep up-to-date on administrative responsibilities such as internal service records in a timely manner
- Maintain tools and test equipment properly and ensuring that they are calibrated as needed
- Comply with Health and Human Services, FDA, Environment Health and Safety and/or all other applicable regulatory requirements
- Ensure regulatory compliance through Validation & Verification plan execution and analysis
- Lead Compliance, as well as Environmental, Health & Safety efforts in support of plant goals
profile_positions.title: Internship in diagnostics of hospital devices (repair centre)

profile_positions.description:
Key responsibilities:
- Interact with Cast Members by providing information of about over 200 types of costumes
- Sort and organising costumes and operating a computerised costume issue system
- Issue and assembling costumes to Cast Members performing in shows / parades
Key achievements:
- Satisfactory completion of the program in a demanding and high quality customer service environment
profile_positions.title: Cast Costuming & Entertainment (Electrical Parade)

profile_positions.description:
- Handle laminated manufacturing as part of the shift team in shifts
- Product as per plan and ensure productivity, cost and delivery in his work area
- Carry out minor maintenance job in finishing section
- Carry out self inspection on finished product ensuring defect free glasses are moved for dispatch 
- Maintain all relevant records during each stage of production
- Maintain close coordination with planning & other production team
profile_positions.title: Glass manufacturing - General Plant Operator, Finishing Section

profile_positions.description:
- Prepare work to be accomplished by studying assembly instructions and parts lists; gathering parts, subassemblies, tools and materials.
- Keep equipment operational by completing preventive maintenance requirements; following manufacturer's instructions; troubleshooting malfunctions; calling for repairs.
profile_positions.title: General Plant Operator in Appliance Assembly

volunteer_experiences.role: Support Team Panda runners at the Virgin Money London Marathon 2017
volunteer_experiences.description: Volunteering for Team Panda involves being based at one of our cheering spots along the route. Duties include helping setting up our cheer spot, such as putting banners and flags up and just generally being there on hand to help out.

volunteer_experiences.role: Assistant of new foreign students at the URJC Madrid collaborating with the Buddy Program
volunteer_experiences.description: My main role was to help new foreign students (who generally had problems with language) that just arrived to the Rey Juan Carlos University in Madrid to facilitate their arrival to Spain guiding them with anything they needed.
